data: The salon which the Cardinal-Archbishop used as a reception room had been fitted, in the time of Louis XV., with panellings of carved wood painted a light grey.
France, Anatole, 1844-1924; Chapman, Frederic, -1918 [Editor]; Willcocks, M. P. (Mary Patricia), 1869-1952 [Translator]
